Question.Subject: Why isn't hulu working ?
Question.Content: hulu the tv steaming website is not working is it me or the site when i try and play a video it says... "sorry this video can not be steamed click here to fix this problem" i tried "clicking here" but is say how to check the internet browser i've done what it says but still nothing, i have tried other video's but the same thing... also the desktop download download you can get dose not work it say the same thing. please help ? I live in the UK ?
Question.ChosenAnswer: It doesn't work if you live in certain countries. But if you live in the U.S. it should work.

Answer.Content: It doesn't work if you live in certain countries. But if you live in the U.S. it should work.
Hulu only is available in the USA. However you can use a personal vpn, http://www.surfbouncer.com to give you a fast usa IP address and watch Hulu and any other US programming from the UK.
